resources.string: Due to the low humidity and temperature recorded by the device we recommend that you simply massage and stretch the affected area.
Due to the relatively high humidity levels we recommend that you we recommend that you apply an ice pack to the painful areas.
Due to the high humidity in the air and the pain you seem to be experiencing we recommend that you take anti-inflammatory pills before going outdoors.
Due to the extreme pain you seem to be experiencing we recommend immediate surgery.
